content: I was looking at some lemmas to do with docs#orbit_rel/docs4#orbitRel and noticed that if I put simps on it, it gives the output Setoid.r a b = (a ∈ MulAction.orbit α b) instead of the "correct" output that uses iff. Is this something that's easily fixable on the simps end?
A side note, but things are extra messy here because we have three spellings of setoid.r; the other two are docs#setoid.rel and docs#has_equiv
This is not a current feature of simps.
